summary: Email correspondence regarding an Epstein victim's request to attend an FBI briefing in New York on October 23, 2019. The victim's attorney coordinates logistics and indicates the victim is willing to meet with agents about her experience.

persons.name: Brad Edwards
persons.context: Appears to be copied on the email regarding coordination for an Epstein victim to attend an FBI briefing.

persons.name: Brittany Henderson
persons.context: Sends email to FBI (NY) requesting details for her client to attend the FBI briefing on October 23 and offers to coordinate a meeting about the client's experience.

persons.name: Rachel
persons.context: Mentioned as the person FBI HQ will reach out to in order to coordinate the victim's attendance at the briefing.

connections.description: Brittany Henderson's client's attendance at the FBI briefing is to be coordinated by FBI HQ reaching out to Rachel.
Both are copied on the email regarding victim services and coordination with the FBI.

events.title: FBI Briefing for Epstein Victims in New York
events.description: An FBI briefing scheduled in New York for Epstein victims. A victim represented by Brittany Henderson wishes to attend.

keyFacts: An Epstein victim located in Louisiana wishes to attend an FBI briefing in New York on October 23, 2019.
The victim's attorney, Brittany Henderson, is coordinating with the FBI (NY) and indicates the victim is willing to meet with agents about her experience.
FBI HQ is to reach out to a person named Rachel to coordinate the victim's attendance and travel assistance.
